original: tsha tur tar+sha/_bod skad du/_de kho na nyid bzhi pa/_dpal he ru ka la phyag
analyzed: tsha tur tar+sha/_bod skad du/_de kho na nyid bzhi pa/_dpal he ru ka la phyag

original: 'tshhal lo/_/bla ma mchog dang he ru ka_/mgon la btud nas 'grib med pa'i/_/
analyzed: 'tshhal lo/_/bla ma mchog dang he ru ka_/mgon la btud nas 'grib med pa'i/_/
translated: Having bowed to the supreme guru and the protector Heruka,🔽this nectar light, which is free of decline,

original: bdud rtshi'i 'od 'dis snying la ni/_/bsil ba'i chu bo 'bab pa sbyin/_/de la
analyzed: bdud rtshi'i 'od 'dis snying la ni/_/bsil ba'i chu bo 'bab pa sbyin/_/de la

original: bdag gi de kho na nyid ni sems 'di'i rang bzhin chu bo ltar rab tu 'jug pa/
analyzed: bdag gi de kho na nyid ni sems 'di'i rang bzhin chu bo ltar rab tu 'jug pa/

original: nang ni bde ba dam pa/_rnam par dpyad na mi dmigs pa/_'di ni byis pa
analyzed: nang ni bde ba dam pa/_rnam par dpyad na mi dmigs pa/_'di ni byis pa
translated: This is not understood by🔽foolish ordinary beings who lack the guru’s intimate instructions,

analyzed: so so'i skye bo bla ma'i man ngag dang bral ba rnams kyis mi shes te/_mchog tu phra

analyzed: ba rang bzhin spros pa med pa/_brjod du med pa 'dis ni las kyang byed/_bya

analyzed: spangs nas gzhan du ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa rtog mi 'gyur/_/zhal phyag rnam

analyzed: pa'i gzugs can nyid/_/mchog tu bde ba gzugs med pa/_/de phyir 'gro

analyzed: kun lhan cig skyes/_/rang bzhin lhan cig skyes shes brjod/_/lus la ye shes

analyzed: chen po gnas/_/rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/_/dngos po kun la khyab

analyzed: pa po/_/lus la gnas kyang lus skyes min/_/sems ni chen po gcig nyid la/_/

analyzed: phrag du ma skye bar 'gyur/_/rin chen sems las phyir gyur pa'i/_/sangs rgyas

analyzed: med cing sems can med/_/gnas pa'i don dang rnam shes dang /_/phyi rol

analyzed: gyur pa 'ga' yang med/_/gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/_/ro dang reg

analyzed: dbyings mchog tu zhi ba'o/_/rnam rtog bde ba ma yin pas/_/rin chen sems

analyzed: ni dri mar byas/_/ji ltar nam mkha' dri med bzhin/_/dag pa'i sems kyis

analyzed: gnyis gnyis rnal 'byor ma/_/re re rnam pa rnams su brjod/_/rkyang ma ro ma

original: dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid/_/gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med/_/
analyzed: dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid/_/gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med/_/
translated: joy is not innate.

original: mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can/_/mun pa la ni mar me ltar/_/de
analyzed: mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can/_/mun pa la ni mar me ltar/_/de
translated: separations,🔽is to be trusted by the son.

original: bzhin bus kyang yid ches kyis/_/yang na de nyid thams cad bdag_/yang
analyzed: bzhin bus kyang yid ches kyis/_/yang na de nyid thams cad bdag_/yang
translated: Or else, it is all that is,🔽or else, it is completely abandoned,🔽and that is also indicated by the first of the blissful

original: na kun gyis rnam par spangs/_/de yang dga' bral dang por mtshhon/_/'dod
analyzed: na kun gyis rnam par spangs/_/de yang dga' bral dang por mtshhon/_/'dod
translated: separations.🔽It is neither attachment nor separation from attachment,

original: chags med cing chags bral med/_/dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/
analyzed: chags med cing chags bral med/_/dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/
translated: nor is it apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the abandonment of the three,

analyzed: gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir/_/lhan gcig skyes pa byang chub brjod/_/gang
translated: it is called coemergent awakening.🔽Since the great elements are blissful,

analyzed: phyir 'byung ba che bde ba/_/de phyir bde ba de nyid min/_/lhan cig skyes las
translated: that bliss is not reality.🔽What arises from the coemergent🔽is said to be coemergent.

original: gang skyes pa/_/lhan cig skyes par de brjod bya/_/rang bzhin lhan cig skyes
analyzed: gang skyes pa/_/lhan cig skyes par de brjod bya/_/rang bzhin lhan cig skyes
translated: The nature is said to be coemergent,🔽and all aspects are contained in one.

original: shes brjod/_/rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig_/lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba
analyzed: shes brjod/_/rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig_/lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba
translated: The blazing of caṇḍālī at the navel🔽burns the five tathāgatas

original: yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lnga sregs shing /_/spyan la sogs pa yang sregs
analyzed: yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lnga sregs shing /_/spyan la sogs pa yang sregs
translated: and also Lochanā, and so on.

original: te/_/sregs pas ri bong can ham 'dzag_/kun rdzob kun da lta bu nyid/_/
analyzed: te/_/sregs pas ri bong can ham 'dzag_/kun rdzob kun da lta bu nyid/_/
translated: The moon is dripping with the nectar of bliss,🔽and the relative is like a blue lotus.🔽The ultimate is the form of bliss.

original: don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no/_/bud med kak+kol bde ba can/_/e wam
analyzed: don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no/_/bud med kak+kol bde ba can/_/e wam
translated: The bliss of the bhaga of a woman🔽is the form of the aspect of evam.🔽Because it protects bliss,

original: rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs/_/bde ba srung ba nyid kyi phyir/_/bde ba can zhes
analyzed: rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs/_/bde ba srung ba nyid kyi phyir/_/bde ba can zhes
translated: it is called “the bliss-gone.”🔽Since bliss is known in an instant,

original: rab tu brjod/_/skad cig shes na bde shes pas/_/e wam yi ger rab tu
analyzed: rab tu brjod/_/skad cig shes na bde shes pas/_/e wam yi ger rab tu
translated: it is well known as the syllable evam.🔽Since it is differentiated by the divisions of an instant,

original: gnas/_/skad cig dbye bas phye ba las/_/dga' ba de las skye bar 'gyur/_/
analyzed: gnas/_/skad cig dbye bas phye ba las/_/dga' ba de las skye bar 'gyur/_/
translated: joy arises from that.

original: ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do/_/gsungs pa rnams yang bshad pa/_sems can
analyzed: ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do/_/gsungs pa rnams yang bshad pa/_sems can
translated: The reality of pristine consciousness is explained:🔽Sentient beings are buddhas,🔽but they are obscured by temporary taints.

original: rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid/_/'on kyang blo bur dri mas sgribs/_/de bsal na
analyzed: rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid/_/'on kyang blo bur dri mas sgribs/_/de bsal na
translated: If those are removed,🔽they are always buddhas,

analyzed: ni sangs rgyas nyid/_/rtag tu rang bzhin bde ba can/_/'jig rten khams ni
translated: endowed with natural bliss.🔽Buddhas are not found anywhere else🔽in the world systems.

original: gang du yang /_/sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi 'gyur/_/sems ni rdzogs pa'i
analyzed: gang du yang /_/sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi 'gyur/_/sems ni rdzogs pa'i
translated: The mind is perfect buddhahood.

original: sangs rgyas te/_/sangs rgyas gzhan du rtshal du med/_/sad dang gnyid dang rmi
analyzed: sangs rgyas te/_/sangs rgyas gzhan du rtshal du med/_/sad dang gnyid dang rmi
translated: The buddhas are not other than that.

original: lam dang /_/'dod spyod las ni sku rnams 'grub/_/'khor lo bzhi las sde pa🔽sogs/_/sku bzhi rab tu 'byung ba'o/_/chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang /_/ de bzhin du ni bde chen nyid/_/skye gnas snying mgrin mgo bor yang /_/sku
analyzed: lam dang /_/'dod spyod las ni sku rnams 'grub/_/'khor lo bzhi las sde pa sogs/_/sku bzhi rab tu 'byung ba'o/_/chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang /_/ de bzhin du ni bde chen nyid/_/skye gnas snying mgrin mgo bor yang /_/sku
translated: The kāyas are accomplished from the activities of sleep,🔽dreams, and desire.🔽The four classes and so on arise from the four cakras.🔽The three kāyas abide in the three places,🔽the place of birth, the throat, and the head.

original: gsum po ni rnam par gnas/_/de bzhin du dga' ba bzhi dang /_skad cig
analyzed: gsum po ni rnam par gnas/_/de bzhin du dga' ba bzhi dang /_skad cig
translated: Similarly, there are four joys,🔽four moments,🔽four results,🔽four realities,

original: ma bzhi dang /_'bras bu bzhi dang /_de kho na nyid bzhi dang /_sde pa bzhi
analyzed: ma bzhi dang /_'bras bu bzhi dang /_de kho na nyid bzhi dang /_sde pa bzhi
translated: four classes,🔽four truths,🔽four divisions,🔽four elements,🔽four goddesses,🔽and four syllables.🔽If one is familiar with the path of yoga

original: dang /_bden pa bzhi dang /_dbye ba bzhi dang /_'byung ba bzhi dang / lha mo bzhi dang /_yi ge bzhi'o/_/stong pa snying rje che ldan pas/_/rnal 'byor
analyzed: dang /_bden pa bzhi dang /_dbye ba bzhi dang /_'byung ba bzhi dang / lha mo bzhi dang /_yi ge bzhi'o/_/stong pa snying rje che ldan pas/_/rnal 'byor
translated: endowed with great compassion and emptiness,🔽the result will be attained,

original: lam la goms byas na/_/de las 'bras bu thob 'gyur te/_/ji ltar gter gyi
analyzed: lam la goms byas na/_/de las 'bras bu thob 'gyur te/_/ji ltar gter gyi
translated: just like a treasure.

original: nor rnyed bzhin/_/dang po sprin dang 'dra ba ste/_/grub na sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur//
analyzed: nor rnyed bzhin/_/dang po sprin dang 'dra ba ste/_/grub na sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur//
translated: and when accomplished, it is like an illusion.🔽Since sleep and waking are not distinguished,🔽it is always like a dream.🔽At first it is in the aspect of a cloud,

original: gnyid log sad pa mi phyed pas/_/rtag tu rmi lam 'dra bar 'gyur/_/dang por sprin gyis rnam pas te/_/gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o/_/gsum pa srin bu me
analyzed: gnyid log sad pa mi phyed pas/_/rtag tu rmi lam 'dra bar 'gyur/_/dang por sprin gyis rnam pas te/_/gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o/_/gsum pa srin bu me
translated: and the second is like smoke.🔽The third is like a firefly,🔽the fourth is like a blazing lamp,

original: khyer dngos/_/bzhi pa mar me gsal 'bar ba'o/_/lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni/_/
analyzed: khyer dngos/_/bzhi pa mar me gsal 'bar ba'o/_/lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni/_/
translated: and the fifth is always luminous,🔽like a cloudless sky.

original: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu te de/_/dngos grub
analyzed: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu te de/_/dngos grub
translated: The cause of omniscience is🔽the entry into the attainment of joy.🔽After that, in a moment,🔽like the aspect of an illusion,

original: nges 'jug dga' ba yin/_/phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar/_/rmi lam rnam pa'i🔽skad cig 'gyur/_/cung zad drod ni thob pa na/_/gal te spyod pa byed 'dod

analyzed: na/_/gal te 'grub 'gyur 'dod yod na/_/'dis ni spyod pa spyad pa nyid/_/

original: de nas phyag rgya chen po sgrub par bya ste/_nyin gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur ba'am//
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya chen po sgrub par bya ste/_nyin gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur ba'am//
translated: Then, one should accomplish the great seal.

original: de kho na nyid bzhi pa
analyzed: de kho na nyid bzhi pa
translated: The four realities🔽are accomplished without doubt🔽through the application of the rite for two days,

original: cho gas nyi ma gnyis nas sam/_/nyin gsum rab tu sbyar bas sam/_/de
analyzed: cho gas nyi ma gnyis nas sam/_/nyin gsum rab tu sbyar bas sam/_/de

analyzed: bzhin nyi ma bzhi yis sam/_/nyin lnga rab tu sbyar ba yis/_/'grub pa 'di la
translated: or five days.🔽Having made offerings with flowers and so forth,

analyzed: the tshhom med/_/me tog sogs pas mchod byas nas/_/bsam gtan gnas su

analyzed: rab 'dug nas/_/phyag rgyar lhan cig rab zhugs te/_/rdo rje sbyor ba yang

analyzed: rengs shar ba'i dus su ni/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshhom med/_/chu rgyus dra
translated: Having a network of veins🔽and all the limbs, with orifices,

analyzed: ba dang bcas shing /_/yan lag kun ldan bu ga can/_/lus de med par snang
translated: that body will appear without🔽existence.

analyzed: bar 'gyur/_/de yi skad cig de nyid la/_/dges pa'i rdo rje'i sku 'dzin 'gyur//

analyzed: chu shing snying po med pa la/_/snying po 'bras bu ro ldan bzhin/_/de bzhin snying

analyzed: bdag med ma dang thabs gcig sbyar/_/bems po ma yin bde chen nga /_/de

analyzed: nyid kyis ni gsang 'dus dang /_/rgyal ba rgya mtshhor ngas bshad do/_/de dag ni

analyzed: go rim bshad pa'o/_/rgyud ni rgya che rtogs dka' bas/_/blo dman sgom pa po
translated: so for the sake of the benefit of the meditators of inferior🔽intellect,🔽I have applied the vajra lines, which are the means of

analyzed: dag la/_/phan skyed rdo rje'i tshhig kho na/_/man ngag rim pas bdag gis sbyar/_/

analyzed: a ho slob dpon na ro zhabs/_/brten las ye shes thob pa yi/_/dom+bis cung
